name: PYRAMIDS OF SALT
description:
Running down the hands, the salt is the sand that slows down time, preserves the gods, and makes the pyramids immortal monuments.  Salt is flavor, sweat, sounds and music that touches the ears, decorates this art and makes time stop running.

 This Art is the result of a collab with @officiallerry, who produced this smooth and powerful sound giving another flavor to my art.  follow his incredible work on his profile and share a lot our first collab
